resources.string: No internet connection. Please try again.
You can enter multiple books by separating their titles, authors, and ISBNs by commas and a space.
Show Sellers for My Wanted Books
How often do you want notifications?
What type of trade do you want to search for?
Complex (where you have to trade with at least 1 person, but not more than 3 people)
Simple (where you only have to trade with one person)
Trade service is running. Wait for a notification.
There are no trades available, and no one is selling any of the books you want.
Empty author/title/ISBN textbox. Please enter a value.
The number of titles, authors, and ISBNs are not equal. Please try again.
ISBNs (separated by commas; must be accurate)
Please enter the 13 digit ISBN only, without dashes and spaces.
At least one ISBN has non-digit characters. Please try again.

This app will help you trade/barter for the books that you want with the books that you have. For example, let\'s say that User 1 has Book A and wants Book B, and User 2 has Book B and wants Book A. This app will connect the two users, and allow them to trade or purchase the books if they want to.

1. Create a list of books for buying and selling by clicking on the \"Create Lists\" button. Be very careful in entering the ISBN correctly, as the app will find trades for your books based on the ISBN. If you enter the ISBN incorrectly, the app may not work as expected. If you are entering multiple books, don\'t forget to put a comma and a space in between each title, author, and ISBN, so the app knows there are multiple books.

2. Return to the main screen. You will see multiple buttons: \"View My Books\", which will allow you to view your books, delete them, and add more books; \"View All Books\", which will show you all the books that everyone (except you) is selling, and their details; \"Notification Settings\", which we will get into later; and \"Show My Sellers for My Wanted Books\", which will allow you view the sellers (if any) for your wanted books, and their details.

Both of the \"View All Books\" and \"Show My Sellers for My Wanted Books\" have detail screens for each book. Clicking on the \"View Details\" button will show you the book details, the seller\"s name, the ISBN, and the books that the seller wants. There is also a \"Contact Seller\" button, which will open an email and prefill it with a subject line, the \"To:\" email field, and a body text template for requesting a book. You are free to change this template to suit your needs before sending the email.

Clicking on the \"Notification Settings\" button will bring up a screen that will allow you to set a frequency for the app to send a notification saying if there are any trades possible, and the app will also allow you to set the type of trade for the app to search for. A simple trade is a direct trade with one person, while a complex trade may involve trading with a maximum of 3 people. Once you select these settings, click \"Save\". You will see a button called \"Start Trade Search\", and when it is clicked, the app will start checking for trades at the frequency selected. When a notification is displayed, you can click on it to go to a special screen that will show you the trades possible. There will also be contact buttons for contacting each seller required for the trade to happen. As explained in the previous section, when you click on a contact button, the email will automatically prefill with the information required, but you are free to change what you want before sending the email.
1) Click on \"Create Lists\" on the home screen to create lists of books to sell and books to buy on the two different pages. Accurate 13 digit ISBNs are critical for correct matches to happen.
2) Click on \"Notification Settings\" on the home screen to setup the notification schedule: once an hour or once a day.

3) Select the type of trade: complex trades are trades where the app could recommend you to do a 3 way trade/exchange, and simple trades are trades where the app would wait to find an exchange with only one other user.
4) Click \"Start Trade Search\" to make the app start looking for possible trades. Wait until it finds a match and sends you a notification (once an hour or once a day as selected in Step 2).
5) Clicking on \"View All Books\" shows all the books available for exchange/barter/selling.
6) Clicking \"Show Sellers for My Wanted Books\" shows the users who have listed the books that are on your buy list.
7) Once the notification appears, click on it, and the app will recommend how to proceed. It will generate emails with details to contact the other sellers, allowing you to proceed with the exchange.
Click on \"More Details\" below for detailed instructions.

Instead of buying and selling books, you can trade/exchange books with others that have what you need and that need what you have. This trade can be directly with one person or you can do a 2-way or 3-way trade. Click on \"More Details\" if you need examples.
This app was created by a high schooler. Please feel free to donate via PayPal or Venmo to gauboyinc@gmail.com. :)
At least one ISBN isn\'t exactly 13 digits long. Please try again.
